description: This file implements an in-memory data store for a surgical scheduling system, including seed data, helper functions for CRUD operations, and initial data population.

methods.name: seed()
methods.description: Populates the in-memory store with initial sample data for doctors, nurses, rooms, devices, and an initial schedule event.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Converts a Map into an array of its values.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Retrieves an item from a Map by its ID, or returns null if not found.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new entry in the Map with a generated or provided ID.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing Map entry with new data by its ID.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Removes an entry from the Map by its ID.
